content.raw:
Hey :),

so in favor of the idea of a plugin database:

We can add .so and .dll files (+ deprecated .dylib) to the plugin database and all of them are searched for and listed in the insert tab, for example. 

Now how do we handle Windows dll. files in our plugin.hh? Should we use an additional hack for this, alike the  #ifdef __APPLE__ hack and replace the .dll with an .so?
content.html:
Hey :),

so in favor of the idea of a plugin database:

We can add .so and .dll files (+ deprecated .dylib) to the plugin database and all of them are searched for and listed in the insert tab, for example.

Now how do we handle Windows dll. files in our plugin.hh? Should we use an additional hack for this, alike the #ifdef APPLE hack and replace the .dll with an .so?
